channel.title: natural on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in natural on Barefoot Rob

item.title: holy cats new favorite kanji
item.description: 21:45 Tuesday 09 June 2015 JST I don’t know how to read them yet, but after I was just telling Mutsumi that the weather cannot get hot enough for me, she showed me kanji above the train door which mean “this car doesn’t have the AC on full blast.” Apparently, it doesn’t have the AC (compressor) on at all! Just fans, and I love it. The kanji are written above the doors on car 4 of this Yamanote Line train.
